graphicslib3D

Class NormalizationCubeMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphicslib3D.NormalizationCubeMap

  • public class NormalizationCubeMap
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines a normalization cube map; that is, a set of six data arrays suitable for defining a Cube Map Texture such that indexing the texture with a vector V= [x y z] returns a texel whose RGB components are the normalized equivalent of V.

    Warning: this class is currently not complete; do not use!

    Author:
    John Clevenger, based on a version by Paul Baker

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NormalizationCubeMap(int size)
      Constructs a Normalization Cube Map with a resolution of size in each direction.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • NormalizationCubeMap

        public NormalizationCubeMap(int size)
        Constructs a Normalization Cube Map with a resolution of size in each direction. Size values of around 32 are usually more than sufficient for normalizing things like 8-bit color values used as vectors.
        Parameters:
        size - the resolution of the cube map texture in each direction
